## Discussion

Provide this object to update the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/recurringPaymentRequest] value in the original [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest], if necessary, after the user updated the shipping method.

# newRecurringPaymentRequest

**Instance Property**

An updated request for a recurring payment.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayRecurringPaymentRequest newRecurringPaymentRequest;
```

## Discussion

Provide this object to update the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/recurringPaymentRequest] value in the original [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest], if necessary, after the user updated the shipping method.
title: newRecurringPaymentRequest
